name: WhiteNoiseMachine
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise machine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
White Noise Machine lets you reproduce relaxing audio tracks to help you study and concentrate. We recommend playing this skill to concentrate and improve the way you study. If you need concentration or if you can't sleep well, play this skill and enjoy the relax.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
